resources.title: Essential Oil Remedy: Anugnya Holistic Care's Answer to Radiation and Chemo
resources.description: Chief Healing Officer Sangeeta Bhalla explains how her proprietary blends maintain patients' physical, energy and emotional strength to ensure continuity of cancer treatment.

resources.title: Viiveck Verma : A Caregiver's Journey. (The caregiver needs care too.)
resources.description: Viiveck took care of Prernaa, his wife. She had a 11 year journey with 9 reappearances of Cancer. For both it is a profile in courage.

resources.title: Sangeeta's Cancer Recovery Journey: From Patient to Healer to Entrepreneur
resources.description: We explore Sangeeta's 10 year journey following her cancer diagnosis, her transition from patient to healer, and establishment of Anugnya Holistic Care.

resources.title: Neerad's Journey Through Cancer : Brave, Honest Resilient.
resources.description: Neerad emerged from his bout with Leukemia, braver, better and stronger. His story of taking care of the guest, cancer and then letting it go.

resources.title: Remote Energy Healing: The Support I Found After Cancer Treatment
resources.description: After cancer treatment ended, Sangeeta struggled to even walk to her balcony. A remote energy healer entered her lifeâ€”someone who truly understood.

resources.title: A Cancer Survivor's Journey: Learning to Heal Others | Bridging Modern Medicine & Ancient Wisdom
resources.description: After her cancer diagnosis, Sangeeta found energy healing accelerated her recovery. Their message: the best healing comes from marrying modern medicine with ancient wisdom.

resources.title: Cancer, Loss, and New Beginnings | When Friends Become Your Foundation
resources.description: Sangeeta faced her cancer diagnosis with no home in Delhi and feeling alienated in New York. Friends stepped up. This is the truth: you can't do it alone.

resources.title: Navigating Cancer as a Couple. Finding Patience, Acceptance, and Grace Together
resources.description: When cancer enters your lives, the hardest lesson is patience. Sangeeta and Rajiv learned to cultivate patience, acceptance, and introspection.

resources.title: Learning Energy Healing: From Basic Techniques to Psychotherapy
resources.description: Energy healing is protocol-driven with clear training levels. Basic, advanced, and psychotherapy levels with specialized protocols.
